(#{item.custId}, NULL, #{item.schoolName}, #{item.college}, #{item.major}, #{item.enterYear}, NULL, NULL, NULL, '0', NULL, NULL, #{item.province}, #{item.city}, '0', NULL, 'N', NULL, #{item.lastUpdateTime}, NULL, #{item.schoolId}, 1, NULL)

update p2p_student_cust
SIGN_TXT = #{signTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHOOL_NAME = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLEGE = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENTER_YEAR = #{enterYear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DREAMS = #{dreams,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELATIONSHIP = #{relationship,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTH_SECRET = #{birthSecret,jdbcType=CHAR},
SCHOOL_NAME_SECRET = #{schoolNameSecret,jdbcType=CHAR},
SEX_SECRET = #{sexSecret,jdbcType=CHAR},
RELATIONSHIP_SECRET = #{relationshipSecret,jdbcType=CHAR},
PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT_SECRET = #{parentSecret,jdbcType=CHAR},
APP_MARKET = #{appMarket,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TALK_FLAG = #{talkFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
CADRE = #{cadre,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHOOL_ID = #{schoolId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IS_ADULT = #{isAdult,jdbcType=BIT},
GRADUATE_TIME = #{graduateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update p2p_student_cust set SIGN_TXT = #{signTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHOOL_NAME = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLLEGE = #{college,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAJOR = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENTER_YEAR = #{enterYear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DREAMS = #{dreams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELATIONSHIP = #{relationship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BIRTH_SECRET = #{birthSecret,jdbcType=CHAR}, SCHOOL_NAME_SECRET = #{schoolNameSecret,jdbcType=CHAR}, SEX_SECRET = #{sexSecret,jdbcType=CHAR}, RELATIONSHIP_SECRET = #{relationshipSecret,jdbcType=CHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_SECRET = #{parentSecret,jdbcType=CHAR}, APP_MARKET = #{appMarket,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TALK_FLAG = #{talkFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, CADRE = #{cadre,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CARD_NO = #{cardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHOOL_ID = #{schoolId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IS_ADULT = #{isAdult,jdbcType=BIT}, GRADUATE_TIME = #{graduateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
